summary: Okazaki Tomoya is a delinquent who finds life dull and believes he'll never amount to anything. Along with his friend Sunohara, he skips school and plans to waste his high school days away.
cast: Kenji Nojima|Mai Nakahara|Ryôtarô Okiayu|Kikuko Inoue|Daisuke Sakaguchi|Houko Kuwashima|Ryô Hirohashi|Hikaru Midorikawa|Yûko Minaguchi|Kazuki Yao|Nobuaki Kanemitsu|Hiroki Takahashi|Yukitoshi Tokumoto|Takuma Suzuki|Tomoko Fujino|Moyu Arishima|Takashi Matsuyama|Kensuke Nishi|Suzuna Kinosuta|Yurin|Hiroshi Naka|Satomi Kôrogi|Chris Ayres|Greg Ayres|Clint Bickham|Shelley Calene-Black|Luci Christian|Kaytha Coker|Kara Greenberg|Illich Guardiola|Chris Hutchison|Andrew Love|David Matranga|Blake Shepard|Stephanie Wittels
title: Clannad
